perturbation.original_text: (6) The payment of the Advertising Cost Compensation shall occur monthly insofar as the sum due exceeds a value of 100 EUR / 100 USD. If this is not the case, the sum due can be retained until a total value of at least 100 EUR / 100 USD is reached, at the latest, upon termination of the Affiliate's participation in the Program.
perturbation.changed_text: (6) The payment of the Advertising Cost Compensation shall occur monthly insofar as the sum due exceeds a value of 100 EUR / 100 USD. If this is not the case, the sum due can be retained until a total value of at least 500 EUR / 500 USD is reached, at the latest, upon termination of the Affiliate's participation in the Program.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by changing the minimum amount required before payment is made, which creates uncertainty about the payment terms.

perturbation.original_text: WHITHIN 14 DAYS OF THE ANNOUNCEMENT OF CHANGED PARTICIPATION TERMS, AFFILIATE AND SOFTWARE PUBLISHER MAY OBJECT TO SUCH CHANGES. IF NO OBJECTION IS RECEIVED DURING THIS TIME, THE PARTICIPANT IS DEEMED TO HAVE ACCEPTED THE CHANGES AND THEY WILL BECOME PART OF THE EXISTING RELATIONS UNDER THE AGREEMENT.
perturbation.changed_text: WHITHIN 14 DAYS OF THE ANNOUNCEMENT OF CHANGED PARTICIPATION TERMS, AFFILIATE AND SOFTWARE PUBLISHER MAY OBJECT TO SUCH CHANGES. IF NO OBJECTION IS RECEIVED DURING THIS TIME, THE PARTICIPANT IS DEEMED TO HAVE ACCEPTED THE CHANGES UNLESS ELEMENT 5 NOTIFIES OTHERWISE.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by adding a condition where changes can be accepted or not despite no objections being raised. This adds uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text: Either party may cancel this Agreement at any time, with or without supplying a reason, through written notification or by making suitable settings in the respective Control Panel.
perturbation.changed_text: Either party may cancel this Agreement at any time, with or without supplying a reason, through written notification. Cancellation via settings in the respective Control Panel is only permitted for Affiliates.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by restricting the cancellation methods allowed for different parties. This creates uncertainty about how a Software Publisher can properly terminate the agreement and potential disputes.
